Header.title: ProductMove
Header.paragraph: Effective Product delivery and lifecycle tracking

About.paragraph: BIGCORP is a corporation specializing in the production of industrial goods. Their products are widely consumed across the country.
About.paragraph2: This group has many production facilities/factories and many product warranty centers across the country. On the other hand, the group has established a wide network of product distribution agents.
About.paragraph3: ProductionMove is the software used by BigCorp to track the lifecycle of their products. Manufacturing facilities, distributors, and warranty centers all use ProductionMove to collaborate on product distribution and lifecycle tracking.

Services.name: Production and Distribution
Services.text: Products after being manufactured will be imported into the factory's new product warehouse and then taken to distribution agents and delivered to customers.

Services.name: Insurance
Services.text: Defective products within the warranty period are brought to the nearest warranty center, repaired, and then returned to the customer.

Services.name: Return
Services.text: If it cannot be repaired, BigCorp will have to return the new product to the customer. Defective products are brought to BigCorp's production facilities for research and recycling.

Services.name: Recall
Services.text: All defective products distributed to customers will be recalled for repair

Services.name: Product Status control
Services.text: Update the product status in the database of each agent

Services.name: Statistic
Services.text: Statistics, analysis and reporting of data

Features.title: BigCorp Administrator
Features.text: Manage product line portfolio & Agents account
